long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X Following Tab Switcher automatically switches your X (formerly Twitter) feed to the 'Following' tab when you load the page. This extension ensures you always see tweets from accounts you follow, rather than the algorithm-driven 'For You' tab. Features:

- Automatic switching to 'Following' tab on page load
- Works on both twitter.com and x.com domains
- Discreet notification when the switch occurs
- No user interaction required

Improve your X browsing experience by focusing on the content you've chosen to follow!
